top_stories.title: Killing of Trump ally lays bare America's bloody and broken politics
top_stories.description: Charlie Kirk's killing is another episode of gun violence in America and the latest in a line of recent political violence.

top_stories.title: Manhunt intensifies for suspect who killed Charlie Kirk
top_stories.description: Police are searching door-to-door in the hunt for the suspect who shot the conservative activist and influential Trump ally at a Utah campus.

top_stories.title: Accidental or deliberate? Russia's drone incursion into Poland is a test for Nato
top_stories.description: Whether the drone incursion was deliberate or accidental, Moscow will be watching Nato's response to it closely.

top_stories.title: Harry's tea with Charles could be small but significant step to reconciliation
top_stories.description: The king and his son have met in person for the first time since February 2024 - but the clues a reunion was nearing have been there, writes senior royal correspondent Daniela Relph.

top_stories.title: Firms will hesitate to invest in US after raid - S Korea president
top_stories.description: More than 300 South Koreans who were arrested in the raid are due to return home on Friday.

quick_reads.title: Mothers and staff tell of global charity's role in child disappearances under Assad regime
quick_reads.description: The Assad regime used an international charity to hide children of detainees from their families.

quick_reads.title: 'Netanyahu, we're not leaving': Defiance in Gaza City as Israel shows aid sites planned for evacuees
quick_reads.description: As Israel insists the whole population of Gaza City must leave, the BBC visits new aid sites the army claims will help them.

quick_reads.title: Nepal turmoil adds to India's woes in South Asia
quick_reads.description: Any instability in the country is a cause of concern for India because of Nepal's strategic location.

quick_reads.title: Poland says it shot down Russian drones after airspace violation
quick_reads.description: Nato jets were deployed to respond to drones that entered Polish airspace during Russian strikes on Ukraine.

quick_reads.title: Weleda launches inquiry into Nazi camp skin test claims
quick_reads.description: A new study alleges the skincare brand's product was used for human experiments by a Nazi doctor.

top_stories.title: A California bill that would regulate AI companion chatbots is close to becoming law
top_stories.description: If SB 243 is enacted, California would become the first state to require operators to implement safety protocols for AI companions and hold companies legally accountable if their chatbots fail to meet those standards.

top_stories.title: Perplexity reportedly raised $200M at $20B valuation
top_stories.description: The AI-powered search startup's valuation jumped from $18 billion two months earlier.

top_stories.title: Thinking Machines Lab wants to make AI models more consistent
top_stories.description: In a blog post shared Wednesday, Mira Murati's startup offered a rare glimpse into some of work its doing to improve AI models.

top_stories.title: How to turn off autoplay on your social media feeds
top_stories.description: Here's how you can turn off autoplaying videos and GIFs on Facebook, Instagram, X, Twitter, and Threads.

top_stories.title: While US stalls, Australia and Anduril move to put XL undersea vehicle into service
top_stories.description: Anduril has landed a lucrative contract and is bringing its uncrewed undersea vehicle Ghost Shark to Australian waters next year.

quick_reads.title: Klarna’s IPO pops, raising $1.4B, with Sequoia as the biggest winner
quick_reads.description: Of the 34.3 million shares Klarna sold, only 5 million were sold by the company, it said. The rest were sold by existing investors.

quick_reads.title: OpenAI and Oracle reportedly ink historic cloud computing deal
quick_reads.description: OpenAI and Oracle reportedly signed a deal that includes OpenAI buying $300 billion of compute over a five-year span.

quick_reads.title: YouTube’s multi-language audio feature for dubbing videos rolls out to all creators
quick_reads.description: YouTube's multi-language audio feature is rolling out to millions of creators, helping them reach a wider global audience.

quick_reads.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025: Full agenda reveal for the brand-new Going Public Stage
quick_reads.description: We recently unveiled the Going Public Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 — a new destination for founders navigating the complexities of company building, from early traction to IPO and beyond.

quick_reads.title: Arc gets its first major order for electric tugboats worth $160M
quick_reads.description: Arc's boats have so far been all-electric, and the company's ambitious mission is to electrify all watercraft. The new tugs will largely operate on electric propulsion, with the motors putting out over 4,000 horsepower drawn from a massive 6 MWh battery onboard.

top_stories.title: Boeing reaches tentative labor deal with striking defense workers
top_stories.description: The IAM Union said Wednesday that it reached a tentative five-year agreement with Boeing for better wages.

top_stories.title: Air India CEO says carrier embracing 'new normal' of safety focus after deadly crash
top_stories.description: The crash occurred just as Air India was in the middle of modernizing its fleets with new seats and amenities as it seeks to compete with larger airlines.

top_stories.title: Former Milwaukee Bucks owner Marc Lasry says he doesn't believe L.A. Clippers owner Steve Ballmer circumvented salary cap
top_stories.description: Former Milwaukee Bucks owner Marc Lasry told CNBC he doesn't believe L.A. Clippers owner Steve Ballmer would knowingly break NBA rules around the salary cap.

top_stories.title: Uber partners with fintech firm Pipe to offer capital to small businesses
top_stories.description: Uber is partnering with fintech firm Pipe to incorporate embedded technology in the Uber Eats Manager for small businesses to access capital.

top_stories.title: Brazil's Embraer lands first U.S. order for E2 jets with Avelo Airlines buying 50 planes
top_stories.description: U.S. upstart airline Avelo said it placed a firm order for 50 Embraer E195‑E2 jets, a win for the Brazilian manufacturer.

quick_reads.title: Wells Fargo CEO sees 'more downside' to U.S. economy as lower-income consumers struggle
quick_reads.description: Wells Fargo CEO Charles Scharf commented on the state of the economy the day after JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon said jobs data shows the economy is weakening.

quick_reads.title: Potbelly acquired by convenience store operator RaceTrac for $566 million
quick_reads.description: Potbelly announced it is being acquired by convenience store operator RaceTrac in a $566 million deal.

quick_reads.title: ESPN inks deal with EverPass Media to bring ESPN+ to bars, restaurants
quick_reads.description: EverPass Media, the joint venture backed by RedBird, the NFL and TKO, reached a deal to stream ESPN+ content to commercial businesses like bars and restaurants.

quick_reads.title: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon says the economy 'is weakening'
quick_reads.description: Labor Department data showing the U.S. added fewer jobs than thought confirm the world's biggest economy is slowing down says JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon.

quick_reads.title: Doing business in China? Factor in deflation
quick_reads.description: Chinese consumers have been hunting for value as prices are falling across the country's economy.
